heading: HR01379
0: A RESOLUTION URGING PRESIDENT RODRIGO DUTERTE TO ALLOT A BUDGET EQUIVALENT TO 2% OF THE COUNTRY'S GDP TO EFFECTIVELY INCREASE OUR COUNTRY'S DEFENSE SPENDING AT PAR WITH OUR ASEAN COUNTERPARTS

FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING PRESIDENT RODRIGO DUTERTE TO ALLOT A BUDGET EQUIVALENT TO 2% OF THE COUNTRY'S GDP TO EFFECTIVELY INCREASE OUR COUNTRY'S DEFENSE SPENDING AT PAR WITH OUR ASEAN COUNTERPARTS
